page.title: 14Dores-Abriachan/Shipwrecks
page.content: The two old barges wrecked in Primrose bay are two old coal barges.the barges were wrecked one day in a very rough storm ,the barges are now in about 1-3ft deep water.The barges used to be upright many years ago,but are now leaning to one side,one barge rests on the other.You could get over to them,but be careful to choose a time when the water is shallow,because sometimes the water is deep,usually after a heavy rainfall.You could get over by boat.To see them you go through Aldourie Woods and keep going until you come to two three roads going in different directions,you take the road going downhill on the right.When you come to the bay you can see them from there.To get oppsite them you take a small path through the heather and plants,you will come to a sandy patch,from their you can cross.
